data.note: There are at least five different generators, but Belize Electricity Limited (BEL) is the only buyer, distributor and transmission company in Belize.
data.name: The power sector has been unbundled (whether privatized or not) into distinct actors for generation, transmission, distribution and retail

data.note: BEL controls transmission, distribution and a small part of the generation market in Belize.
data.name: There are legally separate private companies at each segment of the power system pre-retail
There is an independent transmission system that dispatches according to market dynamics and is not susceptible to state interference

data.note: According to the IMF report on energy subsidies in Latin America and the Caribbean, annual tariffs are set by the regulator on estimated fixed and variable costs and a surcharge/rebate to cover the gap with actual costs. The country has a subsidized electricity tariff for small consumers that consume less than 60kWh per month, called the social tariff.
data.name: Retail electricity prices aren't distorted by subsidies

data.note: In 2013, the Belize Public Utilities Commission held one auction to contract power for the national grid.
data.name: There aren't significant barriers to private sector participation in generation

data.note: Consumers cannot choose who they buy energy from.
data.name: Consumers can choose retail suppliers or third-party power marketers in the retail power market

data.note: Belize does not have a wholesale power market
data.name: There is a functioning competitive wholesale generation market

data.note: Five companies generate electricity in the country: BEL (2%), Becol (74%), Hydro Maya (3%), BAL/Bapcol (1%) and Belcogen (20%). Additionally, 59% of the total electricity sold in the country is imported from Mexico (2014 numbers).
data.name: The generation market has many different actors and is not concentrated in the hands of a few players
The supply market has many different actors and is not concentrated in the hands of a few players
